channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19062] Update constraint_partition_columns.q.out
item.description: TestNegativeCliDriver is error-prone at present but if you run constraint_partition_columns.q on its own you get a diff. I think this is a simple regression caused by HIVE-18726

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
